nodes.text: Jungle Warfare is an article written by Morrie Mullins as a tie in to the Living Force campaign. It was published on the Wizards of the Coast website on May 20, 2004 and took the form of a holonet posting by an elderly Tarasin, a survivor of the Tarasin Uprising. He described some guerrilla warfare tactics for fighting in the jungles that he believed were essential to win a battle on the planet.
